text: Don Edmunds (September 23, 1930 â€“ August 12, 2020) was an American racecar driver and car builder. He was born in Santa Ana, California. He had his first start at Indianapolis Motor Speedway in 1957. He won the 1957 Indianapolis 500 Rookie of the Year. He founded Autoresearch, Inc. in Anaheim, California. Edmunds died on August 12, 2020 at the age of 89.Don Edmunds 1930-2020 ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American racecar drivers Category:Businesspeople from California Category:Sportspeople from California Category:People from Santa Ana, California
title: Don Edmunds
